ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It will consume a lot of your time through writing summaries which you get through for the sake of doing so. You cover some important themes and explore a lot of ground.

Strengths: An excellent qualitative overview of the many challenges facing key actors within the global financial system. Weaknesses: Covers too much material in too little time, and thus in too little depth.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course meaningfully contributed to my understanding of the global financial system, and thus further prepared to enter the workforce as an advisor to investors within that system.
